title: RefereeType
description: A person who may be referred to for information or guidance on the character or other qualities of someone e.g. an applicant for employment or for an academic or other award.

positionTitle.description: The job title of the Referee.

organizationName.description: The associated company or organization of the Referee.

communication.description: The communication to be used to reach the Referee.

yearsKnown.description: The number of years to which the Referee has been known to the person.

relationship.description: The relationship of the Referee to the person.

attachmentReferences.description: A reference to an attachment related to the Referee and the person.

comments.description: Comments related to the Referee and the person.
